ValidationRule.description: US-0018736 [AU] New Project Process/Fields for AU SMB and AU Enterprise US-0007464 - [AU] Make Integration Manager on Project Mandatory US-0007731 - [AU] Update Validation Rule for Project eBay AU SMB US-0009261 - [AU] Change Stage values for AU
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF(AND(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'eBayAUSMB', CONTAINS(TEXT(EBH_Stage__c), 'Integration'), OR(ISBLANK(eBayUser_ID__c), ISBLANK(Shopping_Card__c), ISBLANK(Integration_partner__c), ISBLANK(TEXT(Vertical__c)), ISBLANK(Website__c), ISBLANK(eBayStoreURL__c), ISBLANK(IntegrationManager__c) ), NOT( $Setup.ActiveValidationRules__c.All_Validation_Rules_Deactivated__c), NOT(CONTAINS($Profile.Name, 'System')) ) ,true ,false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The following fields are mandatory for integration Stages: eBay User ID, Shopping Cart, Integration Partner, Vertical, Website, eBay Store URL, Integration Manager
